# Spells (Alphabetical List - M)
## Ma-Me
**<sup>Mad</sup> Hallucination:** Target takes penalties to mental actions.

**Mad Monkeys:** Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

**[[Maddening Oubliette (Spell)|Maddening Oubliette]]****:** Target is transported to a dark and dank prison in an unspecified horrific demiplane.

**[[Maddening Scream (Spell)|Maddening Scream]]****:** Subject has –4 AC, no shield, Reflex save on 20 only.

**[[Maddening Whispers (Spell)|Maddening Whispers]]****:** You induce confusion and madness in subjects.

**[[Maelstrom (Spell)|Maelstrom]]****:** Water vortex traps and damages creatures and objects.

**[[Maestro's Favor (Spell)|Maestro's Favor]]****:** As *[[Crafter's Fortune (Spell)|crafter's fortune]]**,* but the bonus applies to one skill of the caster's choice.

**[[Mage Armor (Spell)|Mage Armor]]****:** Gives subject +4 armor bonus.

**[[Mage Armor, Greater (Spell)|Mage Armor, Greater]]****:** Gives subject +6 armor bonus.

**[[Mage Armor, Improved (Spell)|Mage Armor, Improved]]****:** Gives subject +3 + 1/2 caster levels armor bonus (+8 max. at 10th level).

**[[Mage Armor, Mass (Spell)|Mage Armor, Mass]]****:** As *[[Mage Armor (Spell)|mage armor]]*, but one creature/level.

**[[Mage Burr (Spell)|Mage Burr]]****:** Double arcane spell failure chance for target’s armor.

**[[Mage Clock (Spell)|Mage Clock]]****:** Create a phantasmal timepiece.

**[[Mage Hand (Spell)|Mage Hand]]****:** 5-pound telekinesis.

**[[Mage Hand, Greater (Spell)|Mage Hand, Greater]]****:** As *[[Mage Hand (Spell)|mage hand]]*, but medium range and up to 40 lb.

**[[Mage's Decree (Spell)|Mage’s Decree]]****:** Send a message to creatures within miles.

**[[Mage's Disjunction (Spell)|Mage's Disjunction]]****:** Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

**[[Mage's Faithful Hound (Spell)|Mage’s Faithful Hound]]****:** Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.

**[[Mage's Lucubration (Spell)|Mage’s Lucubration]]****:** Recalls spell of 5th level or lower.

**[[Mage's Magnificent Keep (Spell)|Mage's Magnificent Keep]]****:** Creates a permanent castle or fortress to your specifications.

**[[Mage's Magnificent Mansion (Spell)|Mage’s Magnificent Mansion]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

**[[Mage's Private Sanctum (Spell)|Mage’s Private Sanctum]]****:** Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

**[[Mage's Revenge (Spell)|Mage's Revenge]]****:** Attackers suffer 2d6 points of damage +1/level for each attack.

**[[Mage's Sword (Spell)|Mage’s Sword]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

**[[Magecraft (Spell)|Magecraft]]****:** +5 competence bonus on one [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] check.

**[[Mageship (Spell)|Mageship]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Ship gains the ability to fly.

**[[Magic Aura (Spell)|Magic Aura]]****:** Alters object’s magic aura.

**[[Magic Aura, Greater (Spell)|Magic Aura, Greater]]****:** As *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]*, but also affects creatures and allows more options.

**[[Magic Circle Against Chaos (Spell)|Magic Circle against Chaos]]****:** As *protection* spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 minutes/level.

**[[Magic Circle Against Evil (Spell)|Magic Circle against Evil]]****:** As *protection* spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 minutes/level.

**[[Magic Circle Against Good (Spell)|Magic Circle against Good]]****:** As *protection* spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 minutes/level.

**[[Magic Circle Against Law (Spell)|Magic Circle against Law]]****:** As *protection* spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 minutes/level.

**[[Magic Circle Against Summoning (Spell)|Magic Circle against Summoning]]****:** Prevents the entrance of called or summoned creatures.

**[[Magic Convalescence (Spell)|Magic Convalescence]]****:** Spells cast nearby heal you 1 hp/spell level.

**[[Magic Fang (Spell)|Magic Fang]]****:** One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

**[[Magic Fang, Greater (Spell)|Magic Fang, Greater]]****:** One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max +5).

**[[Magic Fang, Superior (Spell)|Magic Fang, Superior]]****:** Your natural weapons gain +1 enhancement bonus per four levels.

**[[Magic Jar (Spell)|Magic Jar]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Enables possession of another creature.

**[[Magic Miasma (Spell)|Magic Miasma]]****:** Solid fog reduces caster level by –4.

**[[Magic Missile (Spell)|Magic Missile]]****:** 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).

**[[Magic Mouth (Spell)|Magic Mouth]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Objects speaks once when triggered.

**[[Magic of the Dragonheart (Spell)|Magic of the Dragonheart]]****:** Enhance the benefits of your draconic feats.

**[[Magic Savant (Spell)|Magic Savant]]****:** Gain +4 bonus on [[Use Magic Device (Skill)|Use Magic Device]]; take 10 on check if you have 10 ranks.

**[[Magic Shop (Spell)|Magic Shop]]****:** You conjure a sturdy merchant’s shop.

**Magic Siege Engine:** Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

**Magic Siege Engine, Greater:** Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

**[[Magic Stone (Spell)|Magic Stone]]****:** Three stones gain +1 on attack rolls, deal 1d6+1 damage.

**[[Magic Vestment (Spell)|Magic Vestment]]****:** Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

**[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|Magic Weapon]]****:** Weapon gains +1 bonus.

**[[Magic Weapon, Greater (Spell)|Magic Weapon, Greater]]****:** Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

**[[Magic Weapon, Mass (Spell)|Magic Weapon, Mass]]****:** Allies’ weapons gain +1 enhancement bonus.

**[[Magic Weapon, Mass Greater (Spell)|Magic Weapon, Mass Greater]]****:** Allies’ weapons gain +2 or greater enhancement bonus.

**[[Magical Backlash (Spell)|Magical Backlash]]****:** Target takes 2 points of damage per spell level affecting it.

**[[Magical Backlash, Greater (Spell)|Magical Backlash, Greater]]****:** As *[[Magical Backlash (Spell)|magical backlash]]**,* except the target takes damage for 1 round/caster level.

**[[Magician's Workshop (Spell)|Magician’s Workshop]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** 4 hours of crafting are accomplished as if you were investing them.

**[[Magnifying Chime (Spell)|Magnifying Chime]]****:** Touched object deals increasing sonic damage each round.

**[[Magnetic Pulse (Spell)|Magnetic Pulse]]****:** All ferrous metal (objects) are moved randomly (in the area of effect) causing damage.

**[[Magnetism (Spell)|Magnetism]]****:** Ray charges target with powerful magnetic effect.

**[[Magnetism, Greater (Spell)|Magnetism, Greater]]****:** Draw iron or steel objects to yourself with effective Str 30.

**[[Mailed Might of the Magelords (Spell)|Mailed Might of the Magelords]]****:** Field of force around subject grants +8 armor bonus, 

    immunity to 2nd- level or lower force spells, and DR 5/magic. 

**[[Major Creation (Spell)|Major Creation]]****:** As *[[Minor Creation (Spell)|minor creation]]*, plus stone and metal.

**[[Major Image (Spell)|Major Image]]****:** As *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]*, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

**[[Make Manifest (Spell)|Make Manifest]]****:** You cause a creature on a coexistent plane to appear on your plane.

**[[Make Manifest, Mass (Spell)|Make Manifest, Mass]]****:** As *[[Make Manifest (Spell)|make manifest]]* but affecting all creatures in the area.

**[[Make Whole (Spell)|Make Whole]]****:** Repairs an object.

**[[Make Whole, Greater (Spell)|Make Whole, Greater]]****:** As *[[Make Whole (Spell)|make whole]]*, but repairs 1d6 points of damage plus 1 point/level 

     when cast on a construct creature (maximum 10d6+10).

**[[Make Manifest (Spell)|Make Manifest]]****:** You cause a creature on a coexistent plane to appear on your plane.

**[[Make Manifest, Mass (Spell)|Make Manifest, Mass]]****:** As *[[Make Manifest (Spell)|make manifest]]* but affecting all creatures in the area.

**[[Malevolent Miasma (Spell)|Malevolent Miasma]]****:** Cloud of fog deals 1d4 nonlethal damage/level.

**[[Malevolent Tentacles (Spell)|Malevolent Tentacles]]****:** Like *[[Black Tentacles (Spell)|black tentacles]]*, but [[Grappled|grappled]] creatures gain negative levels.

**[[Malevolent Whisper (Spell)|Malevolent Whisper]]****:** Reduces living creature with 10 hp or lower to –9 hp.

**Malicious Spite:** Target is compelled to plot against another.

**[[Mana Flux (Spell)|Mana Flux]]****:** Magic in area has 20% failure chance.

**[[Manifest Death (Spell)|Manifest Death]]****<u>:</u>** Your melee touch attack deals 1d6 points of damage per two caster levels (maximum 15d6).

**[[Manifest Desire (Spell)|Manifest Desire]]****:** Target’s greatest desire appears before her.

**[[Manifest Dragon Heritage (Spell)|Manifest Dragon Heritage]]****:** Conjures a wyvern.

**[[Manifest Dragon Heritage, Greater (Spell)|Manifest Dragon Heritage, Greater]]****:** Conjures a dragon turtle.

**[[Manifest Life (Spell)|Manifest Life]]****:** Your melee touch attack deals 1d6 points of damage per two caster levels (maximum 15d6).

**[[Manifest Nightmare (Spell)|Manifest Nightmare]]****:** Target’s greatest fear appears before him, making him [[Shaken|shaken]] or [[Panicked|panicked]].

**[[Manifestation of the Deity (Spell)|Manifestation of the Deity]]****:** Create illusion of your deity, rendering enemies [[Shaken|shaken]] for 1 round.

**[[Mantle of Calm (Spell)|Mantle of Calm]]****:** Neutralize the rage effects of those who have attacked you.

**[[Mantle of Chaos (Spell)|Mantle of Chaos]]****:** You gain SR 12 + caster level against spells with opposite alignment descriptor.

**[[Mantle of Evil (Spell)|Mantle of Evil]]****:** You gain SR 12 + caster level against spells with opposite alignment descriptor.

**[[Mantle of Good (Spell)|Mantle of Good]]****:** You gain SR 12 + caster level against spells with opposite alignment descriptor.

**[[Mantle of Law (Spell)|Mantle of Law]]****:** You gain SR 12 + caster level against spells with opposite alignment descriptor.

**[[Mantle of the Fiery Spirit (Spell)|Mantle of the Fiery Spirit]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Permanently grants one creature the [[S3.3 - Creature Subtypes (Bestiary 6 Apx)|fire subtype]].

**[[Mantle of the Icy Soul (Spell)|Mantle of the Icy Soul]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Touched creature gains the [[S3.3 - Creature Subtypes (Bestiary 6 Apx)|cold subtype]].

**[[Mantle of Pure Spite (Spell)|Mantle of Pure Spite]]****:** Gain a cumulative DR 1/— and a cumulative +1 bonus on attacks, damage, and AC each time a foe strikes you.

**[[Mantle of the Slime Lord (Spell)|Mantle of the Slime Lord]]****:** Cause a glossy nimbus of energy to surround you.

**[[Manyjaws (Spell)|Manyjaws]]****:** One set of jaws/level attacks enemies for 1d6 damage.

**[[Marching Chant (Spell)|Marching Chant]]****:** Allies can hustle without penalty while you sing or chant.

**Marid's Mastery <sup>R</sup>:** Target gains bonus to attack/damage when combat is in water, penalty if on land.

**Marionette Possession:** As *[[Magic Jar (Spell)|magic jar]]*, but limited to line of sight.

**[[Mark of Doom (Spell)|Mark of Doom]]****:** Subject takes 1d6 damage for each hostile action.

**[[Mark of Judgment (Spell)|Mark of Judgment]]****:** Creatures that attack subject heal 2 points of damage each successful hit.

**[[Mark of Justice (Spell)|Mark of Justice]]****:** Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

**[[Mark of Obvious Ethics (Spell)|Mark of Obvious Ethics]]****:** Other creatures can determine the target’s alignment.

**[[Mark of Sin (Spell)|Mark of Sin]]****:** Subject takes a –10 circumstance penalty on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks to change others’ attitudes 

     and a –4 penalty to one ability score based on your deity; all creatures begin interactions with subject one step close to hostile.

**[[Mark of the Enlightened Soul (Spell)|Mark of the Enlightened Soul]]** **<sup>A</sup>:** Spells gain the good descriptor and deal extra damage to evil creatures.

**[[Mark of the Hunter (Spell)|Mark of the Hunter]]****:** Rune on creature makes it easier to attack.

**[[Mark of the Outcast (Spell)|Mark of the Outcast]]****:** Subject takes –5 penalty on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks and –2 penalty to AC.

**[[Mark of the Unfaithful (Spell)|Mark of the Unfaithful]]****:** Mark someone as an enemy of your faith.

**[[Mark of the Wild (Spell)|Mark of the Wild]]****:** Animals do not attack or threaten you.

**[[Marked Object (Spell)|Marked Object]]****:** You gain bonus to track a specific being.

**[[Marked Pulse (Spell)|Marked Pulse]]****:** 20-ft.-radius burst deals force damage to 1 creature/level, can knock targets prone.

**[[Marks of Forbiddance (Spell)|Marks of Forbiddance]]****:** Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.

**[[Martial Marionette (Spell)|Martial Marionette]]****:** Manipulate foe’s limbs to hamper its attacks and provide you cover.

**[[Martyr's Bargain (Spell)|Martyr’s Bargain]]****:** Delay immediate damage to yourself from a spell to take maximum damage later.

**[[Mask Aberrant Dragonmark (Spell)|Mask Aberrant Dragonmark]]****:** Reshapes your aberrant dragonmark into the likeness of a true dragonmark.

**[[Mask Dweomer (Spell)|Mask Dweomer]]****:** Hides presence of a spell from *[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]*.

**[[Mask of the Ideal (Spell)|Mask of the Ideal]]****:** Gain +4 bonus on skill checks, checks to influence enchanted or conjured creatures.

**[[Masochism (Spell)|Masochism]]****:** For every 10 hp damage caster takes, he gains +1 on attacks, saves, and checks.

**[[Mass Manifest (Spell)|Mass Manifest]]****:** All creatures and unattended objects on coterminous and coexistent planes within the area of *mass manifest* 

*    * are instantly brought onto your plane.

**[[Master Air (Spell)|Master Air]]****:** You sprout insubstantial wings and can fly.

**[[Master Earth (Spell)|Master Earth]]****:** Travel through the earth to any location.

**[[Master Cavalier (Spell)|Master Cavalier]]****:** Gain a +10 bonus on [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] checks, or +20 with special mount; use with other spells grants mount fly speed.

**[[Master Hammer (Spell)|Master Hammer]]****:** Your weapon from the Godhammer discipline gains +6d6 damage bonus.

**[[Masterwork Transformation (Spell)|Masterwork Transformation]]****:** Make a normal item into a masterwork one.

**[[Mastery of the Sky (Spell)|Mastery of the Sky]]****:** Gain +2 on attack rolls and damage rolls while airborne; maneuverability becomes perfect; foes incur penalties against you.

**[[Master's Lament (Spell)|Master’s Lament]]****:** Target and familiar take each other’s damage as well as their own.

**[[Master's Skillful Touch (Spell)|Master’s Skillful Touch]]****:** Subject gains immediate +4 bonus on a skill check.

**[[Master's Touch (Spell)|Master's Touch]]****:** You gain proficiency in a weapon or shield touched for 1 minute/level.

**[[Masking Aura (Spell)|Masking Aura]]****:** Target has its personal magical auras (though not those of magical items it bears) masked.

**[[Maw of Chaos (Spell)|Maw of Chaos]]****:** Chaotic energy dazes, deals damage, impedes concentration.

**[[Maw of Stone (Spell)|Maw of Stone]]****:** Animates cavern opening or chamber.

**[[Maze (Spell)|Maze]]****:** Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

**[[Mechanus Mind (Spell)|Mechanus Mind]]****:** Reformat subject’s mind to be coldly calculating.

**[[Megalodon Empowerment (Spell)|Megalodon Empowerment]]****:** Gain scent, water breathing, swim speed for 1 hour/level.

**[[Meld into Ice (Spell)|Meld into Ice]]****:** You and your gear merge with ice.

**[[Meld Into Mirror (Spell)|Meld into Mirror]]****:** You and your gear merge with a mirror.

**[[Meld Into Stone (Spell)|Meld into Stone]]****:** You and your gear merge with stone.

**[[Melee Manager (Spell)|Melee Manager]]****<sup> M</sup>:** Manipulate time to gain +1 AC, initiative and additonal attacks (1/5 levels).

**[[Melt (Spell)|Melt]]****:** Melt ice and snow or deal 2/level damage (max 10) to magical ice or cold creatures.

**[[Memorize Page (Spell)|Memorize Page]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Target perfectly memorizes one page of information.

**[[Memory Lapse (Spell)|Memory Lapse]]****:** Subject forgets events back to last turn.

**[[Memory Rot (Spell)|Memory Rot]]****:** Spores deal 1d6 Int damage to subject, plus 1 Int drain/round.

**[[Menacing Tentacles (Spell)|Menacing Tentacles]]****:** Grow two tentacles with 10-ft. reach that deal 1d8 damage each.

**[[Mending (Spell)|Mending]]****:** Makes minor repairs on an object.

**[[Mental Pinnacle (Spell)|Mental Pinnacle]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** You gain the mental powers of a psion.

**[[Mephit Mob (Spell)|Mephit Mob]]****:** Summons 2d6 mephits of a kind you designate.

**[[Mesmerizing Glare (Spell)|Mesmerizing Glare]]****:** Your gaze fascinates creatures.

**[[Message (Spell)|Message]]****:** Whisper conversation at distance.

**[[Message, Greater (Spell)|Message, Greater]]****:** You are able speak to creatures over great distances.

**[[Metal Fang (Spell)|Metal Fang]]****:** One of subject’s natural weapons becomes cold iron or silvered and counts as magical for overcoming DR.

**[[Metal Melt (Spell)|Metal Melt]]****:** Melts metal object without heat.

**[[Metal Skin (Spell)|Metal Skin]]****:** Grants +8 natural armor bonus, –2 to Dex.

**[[Metallic Wings (Spell)|Metallic Wings]]****:** As *[[Metallic Wings, Lesser (Spell)|lesser metallic wings]]*, but the wings are stronger and more dangerous.

**[[Metallic Wings, Greater (Spell)|Metallic Wings, Greater]]****:** As *[[Metallic Wings, Lesser (Spell)|lesser metallic wings]]*, but the wings are stronger and more dangerous.

**[[Metallic Wings, Lesser (Spell)|Metallic Wings, Lesser]]****:** Subject grows metallic wings which grant the ability to fly, a shield bonus to AC, and natural attacks.

**[[Metamagic Item (Spell)|Metamagic Item]]****:** Imbue spell trigger item with metamagic feat.

**[[Metamagic Scroll (Spell)|Metamagic Scroll]]****:** Imbue spell completion item with metamagic feat.

**[[Metamorphose Liquids (Spell)|Metamorphose Liquids]]****:** Transform one liquid into another. Magical liquids cannot be created. Poisons may be rendered harmless.

**[[Meteor Swarm (Spell)|Meteor Swarm]]****:** Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.

**[[Meteoric Strike (Spell)|Meteoric Strike]]****:** Melee attack deals an extra 1d6 damage + 1d6/4 levels; adjacent creatures take half damage.

## Mf-Mj
**[[Miasma (Spell)|Miasma]]****:** Gas fills creature’s mouth, suffocating it.

**[[Miasma of Entropy (Spell)|Miasma of Entropy]]****:** Rot all natural materials in 30-ft. cone-shaped burst.

**[[Mighty Fist of the Earth (Spell)|Mighty Fist of the Earth]] <sup>RY</sup>:** Fling a fist-sized rock at your opponent, this rock can channel your ki.

**[[Mighty Hammer (Spell)|Mighty Hammer]]****:** Your weapon from the Godhammer discipline gains +1d6 damage bonus.

**[[Mighty Wallop (Spell)|Mighty Wallop]]****:** +1 size category of bludgeoning weapon.

**[[Mighty Wallop, Greater (Spell)|Mighty Wallop, Greater]]****:** +1 size category of bludgeoning weapon/four levels (maximum 5).

**[[Mimicry (Spell)|Mimicry]]****:** Perfectly mimic familiar sounds, voices, or accents.

**[[Mind Blank (Spell)|Mind Blank]]****:** Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

**[[Mind Bond (Spell)|Mind Bond]]****:** You and your mount gain +4 flanking bonus when flanking the same opponent; mount gains bonus on attack rolls.

**[[Mind Fog (Spell)|Mind Fog]]****:** Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

**[[Mind of the Labyrinth (Spell)|Mind of the Labyrinth]]****:** Confuse enemies who try to affect your mind; dominate one such attacker.

**[[Mind Poison (Spell)|Mind Poison]]****:** Your poisonous touch deals Wis damage.

**[[Mind Stasis (Spell)|Mind Stasis]]****:** As *[[Mind Stasis, Lesser (Spell)|lesser mind stasis]]**,* plus the subject is immune to any effect that would cause him to become 

     or recover from being [[Confused|confused]], enraged, [[Frightened|frightened]], held, or hopeless.

**[[Mind Stasis, Greater (Spell)|Mind Stasis, Greater]]****:** As *[[Mind Stasis (Spell)|mind stasis]]**,* plus the subject is immune to cowering, feebleminded, insanity, panicked, stunned, 

     and all mind-affecting effects.

**[[Mind Stasis, Lesser (Spell)|Mind Stasis, Lesser]]****:** Subject becomes immune to any effect that would cause him to become or recover from being asleep, [[Dazed|dazed]] or [[Shaken|shaken]].

**[[Mindburn (Spell)|Mindburn]]****:** Target loses a spell or infusion each round.

**[[Mindfrost (Spell)|Mindfrost]]****:** Deals 5d6 cold damage, 1d4 Int damage.

**[[Mindless Rage (Spell)|Mindless Rage]]****:** Subject compelled to attack you physically for 1 round/level.

**[[Mindlocked Messenger (Spell)|Mindlocked Messenger]]****:** Target gains a message that can be given only to its intended recipient.

**[[Mindrape (Spell)|Mindrape]]****:** Caster learns everything subject knows and can alter its memory or knowledge.

**[[Mindworms (Spell)|Mindworms]]****:** Target takes 1d6 points of Wis damage and loses three spell levels worth of spells.

**[[Mineralize Warrior (Spell)|Mineralize Warrior]]** **<sup>MX</sup>:** Grants willing subject the mineral warrior template.

**[[Minor Creation (Spell)|Minor Creation]]****:** Creates one cloth or wood object.

**[[Minor Disguise (Spell)|Minor Disguise]]****:** Makes slight changes to your appearance.

**[[Minor Image (Spell)|Minor Image]]****:** As *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]*, plus some sound.

**[[Minute Form (Spell)|Minute Form]]****:** You shrink to Tiny or smaller size.

**[[Miracle (Spell)|Miracle]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Requests a deity’s intercession.

**[[Mirage Arcana (Spell)|Mirage Arcana]]****:** As *[[Hallucinatory Terrain (Spell)|hallucinatory terrain]]*, plus structures.

**[[Mirror of All Worlds (Spell)|Mirror of All Worlds]]****:** Creates a mirror that can gaze into any world or plane.

**[[Mirror Hideaway (Spell)|Mirror Hideaway]]****:** As many as eight creatures hide in an extradimensional space.

**[[Mirror Image (Spell)|Mirror Image]]****:** Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).

**[[Mirror Image, Greater (Spell)|Mirror Image, Greater]]****:** As *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]*, but gain an additional image each round.

**[[Mirror Magic (Spell)|Mirror Magic]]****:**  Converse with another being using a pair of mirrors.

**Mirror Mantis:** Creature sees an looming assassin whenever they see their reflection in a mirror.

**[[Mirror Polish (Spell)|Mirror Polish]]****:** Polish a metal item until it’s usable as a mirror.

**[[Mirror Sending (Spell)|Mirror Sending]]****:** Caster sends her image to a mirror and can see and speak through it.

**[[Mirror Talk (Spell)|Mirror Talk]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Look into one mirror and see out of its matched twin anywhere else on the same plane.

**[[Mirror Transport (Spell)|Mirror Transport]]****:** Mirror becomes a multiple-use *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]**.*

**[[Mirror Travel (Spell)|Mirror Travel]]****:** You can move magically from mirror to mirror (within 1,000 ft. per caster level) instantly.

**[[Mirror Travel, Greater (Spell)|Mirror Travel, Greater]]****:** As *[[Mirror Travel (Spell)|mirror travel]]**,* except that there is no range limit and there is no chance you arrive off target.

**[[Misdirection (Spell)|Misdirection]]****:** Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

**[[Miser's Envy (Spell)|Miser's Envy]]****:** Subject jealously covets a nearby object. 

**Miserable Pity:** Opponents cannot attack a pathetic creature.

**[[Mislead (Spell)|Mislead]]****:** Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

**[[Misrepresent Alignment (Spell)|Misrepresent Alignment]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Projects a false alignment for an object or creature.

**[[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|Mistsight]]****:** You can see through mist, fog, and rain.

## Mk-Mo
**[[Mnemonic Enhancer (Spell)|Mnemonic Enhancer]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Wizard only. Prepare extra spells or retain one just cast.

**[[Mnemonic Siphon (Spell)|Mnemonic Siphon]]:** Inscribe a rune on the target object; when the object finds its way into the hands of a spellcaster, 

     the rune steals one of that creature’s spells and passes the knowledge back to you.

**[[Modify Memory (Spell)|Modify Memory]]****:** Changes 5 minutes of subject’s memories.

**[[Molten Orb (Spell)|Molten Orb]]****:** Molten metal splash weapon deals 2d6 fire damage plus ongoing damage.

**[[Molten Strike (Spell)|Molten Strike]]****:** 5-ft.-radius burst deals 2d6 fire damage, ignites nearby targets.

**[[Moment of Clarity (Spell)|Moment of Clarity]]****:** Target immediately makes a new saving throw to resist a mind-affecting spell or effect.

**Moment of Greatness:** Doubles a morale bonus.

**[[Moment of Prescience (Spell)|Moment of Prescience]]****:** You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

**[[Momentary Revelation (Spell)|Momentary Revelation]]****:** Reveals everything within 20-ft. radius as *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* spell for 1 round.

**[[Monkey Fish (Spell)|Monkey Fish]]:** Gain a climb speed and a swim speed of 10 ft. for a time.

**Monstrous Physique I:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium monstrous humanoid.

**Monstrous Physique II:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large monstrous humanoid.

**Monstrous Physique III:** Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge monstrous humanoid.

**Monstrous Physique IV:** As *monstrous physique III*, with more abilities.

**[[Monstrous Thrall (Spell)|Monstrous Thrall]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but permanent and affects any creature.

**[[Moon Blade (Spell)|Moon Blade]]****:** Creates sword that does 2d8 damage +1/two level, scrambles magic.

**[[Moon Bolt (Spell)|Moon Bolt]]****:** 1d4 Strength damage/3 levels; undead made helpless.

**[[Moon Lust (Spell)|Moon Lust]]****:** Subject obsesses about moon, is [[Fascinated|fascinated]] or [[Dazzled|dazzled]].

**[[Moon Path (Spell)|Moon Path]]****:** Creates invisible stair or bridge.

**[[Moonbeam (Spell)|Moonbeam]]****:** Forces lycanthropes to regain human shape.

**[[Moonbow (Spell)|Moonbow]]****:** Three motes of electricity each deal 1d6/2 levels electricity damage to subjects.

**[[Moonfire (Spell)|Moonfire]]****:** Cone of light damages creatures, reveals hidden things, negates electricity damage.

**[[Moonlight (Spell)|Moonlight]]****:** Surround your hand with moonlight; if used for an attack this light deals 2d6 +1/level, max +5) cold damage.

**[[Moonstruck (Spell)|Moonstruck]]:** Subject is enraged and [[Confused|confused]].

**[[Moral Facade (Spell)|Moral Facade]]****:** Divination spells give a false alignment reading.

**[[Morality Undone (Spell)|Morality Undone]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Subject becomes evil.

**[[Mount (Spell)|Mount]]****:** Summons riding horse for 2 hours/level.

**[[Mountain Stance (Spell)|Mountain Stance]]****:** Subject becomes hard to move.

**[[Move Earth (Spell)|Move Earth]]****:** Digs trenches and builds hills.

**[[Move Snow and Ice (Spell)|Move Snow and Ice]]****:** Digs trenches and builds hills in ice and snow.

## Mu-Mz
**[[Mudball (Spell)|Mudball]] <sup>R</sup>:** Throw a ball of mud to blind your enemy.

**[[Mudslide (Spell)|Mudslide]]****:** Landslide buries, mires creatures within a 40-ft. radius.

**[[Muffle Sound (Spell)|Muffle Sound]]****:** Allies gain a bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks but risk verbal spell failure.

**[[Multidimensional Touch (Spell)|Multidimensional Touch]]****:** Your Debilitating Touch discipline can affect incorporeal targets.

**[[Mummify (Spell)|Mummify]]****:** Touched living creature dies and is mummified.

**Murderous Command:** Target is compelled to kill its ally.

**Murderous Crow <sup>R</sup>:** Conjure a supernaturally vicious and clever crow to watch over you.

**[[Murderous Mist (Spell)|Murderous Mist]]****:** Steam deals 2d6 damage, blinds creatures.

**[[Music of the Spheres (Spell)|Music of the Spheres]]****:** Grant [[Fast Healing (Grand Alchemical Discovery)|fast healing]], resistance, and save bonuses to all creatures in a 20-foot radius from you.

**Mutagenic Touch:** You can pass a weaker version of your mutagen to another creature.

**[[Mysterious Redirection (Spell)|Mysterious Redirection]]****:** Attacks against you have 50% chance to strike adjacent target instead.

**[[Mystic Aegis (Spell)|Mystic Aegis]]****:** You gain SR 12 + caster level against one spell.

**[[Mystic Shield (Spell)|Mystic Shield]]****:** Create an invisible aura around the target that moves with them and prevents all spells 

     and spell-like abilities of 6th level or lower from affecting them.

**[[Mystic Shield, Lesser (Spell)|Mystic Shield, Lesser]]****:** Create an invisible aura around the target that moves with them and prevents all spells 

     and spell-like abilities of 3rd level or lower from affecting them.

**[[Mystic Surge (Spell)|Mystic Surge]]****:** Ally’s spell gains +2 DC and +1 caster level.
